title: Merge upstream CC4Me into BMO fork
description:
Pull 12 upstream commits into CC4Me-BMO. Includes:
- gateway.js fixes (tmux escaping, findTmux(), SIGINT handlers)
- graph.js cleanup (unused token param)
- Deleted webhook-server.js and add-domain.js
- README.md, SETUP.md, init.sh rewrites
- Setup SKILL.md expansion
- Launchd templates

May have merge conflicts on graph.js (both sides modified).
nextStep: git merge upstream/main and resolve conflicts
